channel.title: ASF JIRA
channel.description: This file is an XML representation of an issue

item.title: [HBASE-190] Some source files are missing license headers
item.description:
The output of rat for 0.15.2 shows some missing license headers which must be fixed for 0.16.0:
http://people.apache.org/~siren/hadoop-0.15.2-rc0/rat-hadoop-0.15.2.txt
item.summary: Some source files are missing license headers

status.description: The issue is considered finished, the resolution is correct. Issues which are closed can be reopened.

comments.comment:
Added license headers to 95 files:

src/test/org/apache/hadoop/mapred/TestJobStatusPersistency.java
src/test/org/apache/hadoop/mapred/TestClusterMapReduceTestCase.java
